meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Darby Philip Tiu Gordon Moffat Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7256.

td.p: Amanda Darby, a librarian from Frederick, Maryland
Philip Tiu, an educator from Atlanta, Georgia
Gordon Moffat, an e-discovery professional from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,700)

tr.td: IT WAS 1916
BEST DRAMA SERIES EMMY AWARDS
WORLD OF RELIGION
R-D-R HAR!
(Alex: Those three letters, "R-D-R", will come up in each correct response in that order.)
DOVER EXPOSURE
(Alex: And finally, thanks to Mimi Sheraton, you get to deal with...)

td.a: 1,000 FOODS TO EAT BEFORE YOU DIE
